org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce

类 RowCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.RowCounter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public class RowCounter
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    A job with a just a map phase to count rows. Map outputs table rows IF the input row has columns that have content.

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) static class  RowCounter.RowCounterMapper
      Mapper that runs the count.

      • createSubmittableJob

        public static org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job createSubmittableJob(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                                   String[] args)
                                                            throws IOException
        Sets up the actual job.
        参数:
        conf - The current configuration.
        args - The command line parameters.
        返回:
        The newly created job.
        抛出:
        IOException - When setting up the job fails.

      • parseRowRangeParameter

        private static List<MultiRowRangeFilter.RowRange> parseRowRangeParameter(String arg,
                                                                         String rangeSwitch)

      • setScanFilter

        private static void setScanFilter(Scan scan,
                                  List<MultiRowRangeFilter.RowRange> rowRangeList)
        Sets filter FilterBase to the Scan instance. If provided rowRangeList contains more than one element, method sets filter which is instance of MultiRowRangeFilter. Otherwise, method sets filter which is instance of FirstKeyOnlyFilter. If rowRangeList contains exactly one element, startRow and stopRow are set to the scan.
        参数:
        scan -
        rowRangeList -

      • printUsage

        private static void printUsage(String errorMessage)

      • printUsage

        private static void printUsage()
        Prints usage without error message. Note that we don't document --expected-count, because it's intended for test.

      • run

                 throws Exception
        Main entry point.
        参数:

        抛出:
        Exception - When running the job fails.
